page.title: 02Introduction/Tourism
page.content: The area has therefore,got good and bad points and residents readily accept the disadvantages of poor transport and lack of employment against the advantages of living in a beautiful,peaceful area with a mild climate. The areas of tourism,employment,trade and transport have such an important part in making this region what it is today that these areas were looked at in further detail. {Tourism.} This area of Cornwall has been said to possess unrivaled beauty and a peaceful atmosphere.It has a very mild climate and St. Mawes itself has been said to be the warmest place in the British Isles during the Winter Months. The area is set on the eastern hand of the Falmouth Estuary and has some{PTO
